text: Jo log Allah kay sath aur uss kay payghumbar kay sath kufur kertay hain aur jo log yeh chahtay hain kay Allah aur uss kay rasool kay darmiyan farq keren aur jo log kehtay hain kay baaz nabiyon per to humara eman hai aur baaz per nahi aur chahtay hain kay iss kay aur uss kay bain bain koi raah nikalen
